data.name: Doctor Strange
data.description: Sorcerer Supreme and versatile healer with the ability to remove effects from friends and foes.

starItems.name: Doctor Strange
starItems.description: Sorcerer Supreme and versatile healer with the ability to remove effects from friends and foes.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
Deal +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing per <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> ally
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
This attack deals an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing per <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect into a negative effect.

Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect to primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects into negative effects on all enemies

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>3</color> random positive effects into negative effects.

Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect to primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to flip positive effects into negative effects

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>3</color> random positive effects into negative effects.

Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect to primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
Flip all positive effects into negative effects on all enemies

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to flip all positive effects into negative effects.

Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect to primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to flip positive effect into negative effect

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>90%</color> chance to flip all positive effects into negative effects.

Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect to primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects to primary target

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>90%</color> chance to flip all positive effects into negative effects.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects to primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing
Always flip positive effects into negative effects on all enemies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> Piercing + flip all positive effects into negative effects.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
Revive a dead ally with <color=#86e619>20%</color> Health.

Heal <color=#86e619>3</color> lowest Health allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

2.description:
Revive a dead ally with <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health.

Heal <color=#86e619>3</color> lowest Health allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

3.description:
Revive a dead ally with <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health.

Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

4.description:
Revive a dead ally with <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health.

Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

5.description:
Revive a dead ally with <color=#86e619>40%</color> Health.

Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, clear all negative effects on self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing

6.description:
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies.

Revive a dead ally with <color=#86e619>40%</color> Health.

Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
6.nextUpgrade:
Revive <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> ally with <color=#86e619>65%</color> Health
Revive another random ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health

7.description:
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies.

Revive a dead <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> ally with <color=#86e619>65%</color> Health.
Revive another random dead ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health.

Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

1.description:
On Turn, fill the Speed Bar of the ally with the least Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

When a positive effect is applied to an enemy, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance

2.description:
On Turn, fill the Speed Bar of the ally with the least Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

When a positive effect is applied to an enemy, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.
2.nextUpgrade: When a positive effect is applied to an enemy, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> allies, heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health

3.description:
On Turn, fill the Speed Bar of the ally with the least Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

When a positive effect is applied to an enemy, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> allies:
 > Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.
3.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color> for ally with least Speed Bar
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance

4.description:
On Turn, fill the Speed Bar of the ally with the least Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.

When a positive effect is applied to an enemy, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> allies:
 > Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance.
4.nextUpgrade: When a positive effect is applied to an enemy, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

5.description:
On Turn, fill the Speed Bar of the ally with the least Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.

When a positive effect is applied to an enemy, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> allies:
 > Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance.
